response.original_title: Ensuring Your Place in Hell Vol. IV
response.overview: The forth installment in one of the most disturbing shockumentary series ever made, and it's even more demented than the last! Including a strange video of Mexican origin mocking religious figures, a documentary about the dangers of children meeting with adults, an uncanny MTV segment and a police detainment gone horribly wrong!
response.tagline: The Fourth Entry to the Most Infamous Series...
response.title: Ensuring Your Place in Hell Vol. IV
